reason: Question asks '대상자는 어떻게 선발하나요?' (how are subjects selected?) but the source content is a document checklist, not about selecting anyone. Question-content mismatch. Also, the answer is a raw dump of the source text with no synthesis.
Duplicate answer: answer is identical to q_1_0663 (same source.text, same page, same verbatim content). Also a raw dump with no synthesis.

Unnatural meta-question: '자주 묻는 질문이 있나요?' (are there FAQs?) is a meta-question about the existence of FAQs, not an actual question about the content. Duplicate answer identical to q_1_0663/q_1_0664. Raw dump.
Question includes raw section marker '가' from source heading ('가 학교에서 구비할 서류'), making it unnatural/template-generated. Duplicate answer identical to q_1_0663/q_1_0664/q_1_0665. Raw dump.

Natural question about teacher-to-supervisor transfer. Answer correctly synthesizes content from page 50: 공개경쟁시험, 추천, 기본소양평가 (non-multiple-choice), 역량평가, 평가위원회 (1/2 external), 직무연수. All claims verified against source. Well-structured with clear sections.

Natural question about returning from education professional to teacher. Answer accurately covers: 원직위 복귀 원칙, 5-year/2-year exceptions for 교사/교감 origins, 10+10 year exemption, 1-time-per-stage limit, 과장급 exception. All verified against page 50 lines 33-37. Well-synthesized with table format.

Natural question about re-transfer back to education professional after returning to teaching. Core answer (2-year requirement, 과장급 exclusion) verified against page 50 line 23. The 경기도 10-year detail is from page 51 line 37 (accurate but not cited as source -- minor attribution gap, content itself is correct).

Hallucinated content: answer claims 교장 임기 중 잔여기간이 소멸됨, references 교육공무원법 제29조의2 제2항, mentions 교장·원장임기제실시업무처리지침, and a 동의서 서식 -- none of these details appear in the source page 50. Page 50 only states '본인의 동의를 얻어야 한다' (line 27). The added specifics are fabricated.

Natural question. Answer correctly synthesizes from pages 50 and 51: 원직위 원칙, 5-year/2-year exceptions, 10+10 exemption, 1-time limit, 과장급 exception (all from page 50), 경기도 교감경력+교장자격증+2년+22년 requirement (from page 51 line 31). Both source.text fields verified as substrings. Well-structured.

Natural question about the supervisor exam. Answer synthesizes from page 50: 추천 then 공개경쟁시험, 기본소양평가 (non-multiple-choice), 역량평가, 평가위원회 with 2분의 1 external members, delegation/entrustment to specialized agencies. All verified against page 50 lines 17-21. Both source.text fields confirmed as substrings.
